name: Verina
description: With an extensive knowledge of botany, Verina is always solicitous, always smiling, and always wishing for every flower to be blessed with the miracle of life.

details.Basic Attack: Perform up to 5 consecutive attacks with vines, dealing Spectro DMG.
details.Heavy Attack: Consume Stamina to charge forward, dealing Spectro DMG.
details.Mid-air Attack: Consume Stamina to perform up to 3 consecutive mid-air strikes, dealing Spectro DMG.
details.Mid-air Heavy Attack: Hold Basic Attack in mid-air to plunge, dealing Spectro DMG.
details.Dodge Counter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to counter, dealing Spectro DMG.

details.Overview: Converge an energy field ahead that grows foliage, dealing Spectro DMG in the area.

Rapidly nourishes nearby foliage, dealing Spectro DMG and healing all nearby team members. Applies a Photosynthesis Mark; when allies hit marked targets, Veria triggers a Coordinated Attack that deals Spectro DMG and heals the active ally (1/s).

details.Heavy Attack: Starflower Blooms: If carrying Photosynthesis Energy, consumes 1 stack to restore Concerto Energy and heal all nearby team members; deals Spectro DMG (treated as Heavy Attack).
details.Mid-air Attack: Starflower Blooms: If carrying Photosynthesis Energy, consumes 1 stack to restore Concerto Energy and heal all nearby team members; deals Spectro DMG (treated as Basic Attack). Can be cast after the heavy version.
details.Photosynthesis Energy: Can hold up to 4 stacks. Gain 1 stack after Basic Attack Stage 5 hits, after casting Botany Experiment, and after Intro Skill Verdant Growth.

inherent_skill1.name: Grace of Life
inherent_skill1.description: Prevents a team member from fatal damage and grants a shield equal to 120% of ATK for 10s (triggers once every 10 minutes).

inherent_skill2.name: Gift of Nature
inherent_skill2.description: When casting Starflower Blooms (heavy/mid-air), Arboreal Flourish, or Blossom, increase all team members' ATK by 20% for 20s.

intro_skill.name: Verdant Growth
intro_skill.description: Attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG.

outro_skill.name: Blossom
outro_skill.description: Heal the incoming Resonator by 19% of ATK per second for 6s. All nearby teams gain DMG Amplification +15% for 30s.

resonance_chain.s1: Blossom grants the next character a continuous heal: 20% of Veria's ATK every 5s for 30s.
resonance_chain.s2: Botany Experiment additionally grants 1 Photosynthesis Energy and 10 Concerto Energy.
resonance_chain.s3: Photosynthesis Mark healing from Arboreal Flourish increased by 12%.
resonance_chain.s4: Casting Starflower Blooms (heavy/mid-air), Arboreal Flourish, or Blossom increases all allies' Spectro DMG Bonus by 15% for 24s.
resonance_chain.s5: When healing allies below 50% HP, Veria's healing is increased by 20%.
resonance_chain.s6: Starflower Blooms (heavy/mid-air) deal 20% more DMG and trigger one Coordinated Attack that heals, matching Arboreal Flourish's Photosynthesis Mark effects.
